---
title: "Group 21 UCSB domestic grad enrollment"
author: "Katie Pietrucha and Danny Feinberg"
date: "11/12/2021"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
ucsb_grad <- read_csv(here("data", "ucsb_grad_data.csv"))
```


```{r}
clean_names(ucsb_grad)

ggplot(data = ucsb_grad, aes(x = year_abbr, y = domestic_enrollment)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = ethnicity), position = "fill") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Year", 
       y = "Proportion of domestic enrollment",
       title = "Yearly UCSB Enrollment by Ethnicity",
       subtitle = "Data Collected Between 2008 and 2019"
       )
```
